about_the_game:
You rise from the ashes of fallen revolution. A soldier trained and discarded.
Regain your honor in the arena. Choose Fury or Benevolence as you fight the other contenders.
Catch Cesar's eye and earn a second chance to take Rome!

Gameplay

Arcade style action against waves of opponents within the arena. Each gladiator has a unique set of attacks to pit your wits against. Utilize your primary and secondary attacks along with your blocking ability to eliminate waves of ever increasing enemies.

Can you survive and earn your chance to challenge Cesar, as the people's champion or as a bloodthirsty tyrant?

On offer

A myriad of gladiator types
Steam achievements for vanquished foes
Endless gameplay with increasing difficulty

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent violence and death in an arena deathmatch tournament.

movies.name: The drums of war are beating.

name: Gladiatori

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Single player arena survivor. Earn ranks as you overcome your enemies to reach the top. Each enemy you kill is a step closer to your goal. Choose to spare or execute your foes as the rounds continue. For eternal glory, your rank is projected on the world stage.
